message_1: In the Caesar cipher, the letter 'F' is encrypted as 'K' using the key of 5. If the encrypted message "QLIITMVL" was received, what is the original message?
message_2:
To decrypt the message "QLIITMVL" using the Caesar cipher with a key of 5, we need to shift each letter 5 positions back in the alphabet.

Q -> L (shift back 5 positions)
L -> G (shift back 5 positions)
I -> D (shift back 5 positions)
I -> D (shift back 5 positions)
T -> O (shift back 5 positions)
M -> H (shift back 5 positions)
V -> S (shift back 5 positions)
L -> G (shift back 5 positions)

So, the original message is "LDDOHSG".
